question: You recently went to a concert and thought one of te singers was very good. You want to tell him hoe you feel.Write a letter to the singer. In your letter- say how you feel about his performance-give details of your musical activities-explain how you would like him to help you with your musical activities
text: I am a student at the University of Fraser Valley where you had given a performance last week. I like your singing more than anyone. I found your show full of excitement, enthusiasm and joy. Moreover, your music provides peace to the soul.

You will be glad to know that I am very interested in learning musical instruments and singing. Firstly, as per my weekly schedule, I practice guitar three times a week. Moreover, I take part in all kinds of competitions at the district or state level. In addition, I was also selected for "Voice of Punjab".

You are my role model who has set an example for me that we can achieve anything with our determination. I would appreciate it if  you reply to my emails and letters regarding any questions I have in my mind regarding music so that I can achieve the heights in this field.
I look forward to hearing from you.
